description: Welcome Home! Surrounded by nature and parks and just steps to the awesome Blacklock Fine Arts School, this 3 bedroom family friendly townhome is perfect for your active family. The location could not be better - just outside your doorstep you will find trails and parks including Nicomekl Trail, Al Anderson Pool, Dinosaur Park & and an offleash dog park PLUS the kids can walk to school in less than 1 minute! The spacious and open main floor layout is great, there is tons of potential here, bring your decorating ideas! The huge fenced yard is perfect for kids and pets. 2 Parking spots included. Homes in this fabulous community are rarely available, why buy a condo when you can have a TOWNHOUSE with a HUGE YARD! This is a great home in an amazing location, don't miss it!
